MASTER_PAD_VERSION_INFO.MASTER_PAD_INFO: Portable Application Description, or PAD for short, is a data set that is used by shareware authors to disseminate information to anyone interested in their software products. To find out more go to http://www.asp-shareware.org/pad

Program_Info.Program_Change_Info: Corrected the Notepad++ plugin. Providing Debian packages now. Some more...

English.Keywords: universal GUI, GUI, indent, indenter, beautify, beautifier, format, formatter, GNU Indent, Astyle, Artistic Styler, BCPP, GreatCode, Uncrustify
English.Char_Desc_80: UniversalIndentGUI is a graphical ui (gui) for multiple source code indenters.
English.Char_Desc_250: UniversalIndentGUI is a cross platform compatible graphical ui (gui) for nearly any code formatter, beautifier and indenter like Uncrustify, GreatCode, Artistic Styler, GNU Indent and so on. (Latest news on http://universalindent.sourceforge.net)
English.Char_Desc_450: UniversalIndentGUI is a cross platform compatible GUI for nearly any code formatter, beautifier and indenter like GNU Indent, Uncrustify, Artistic Styler, PHP Stylist, Ruby Beautify, HTML Tidy and many other. Main feature is a live preview to directly see how the selected formatting option affects the source code. (Latest version, news and complete changelog on http://universalindent.sourceforge.net)
English.Char_Desc_2000: UniversalIndentGUI is a GUI fontend for nearly any code beautifier. It allows you to comfortably change each parameter of a beautifier and directly see how the source code is affected done by a live preview. Many free available code beautifier, formatter and indenter are currently supported, like GNU Indent, Uncrustify, Artistic Styler, PHP Stylist, Ruby Beautify, HTML Tidy and many other (look at features for complete list). Currently not supported indenters can be easyly added by creating a configuration file for them. (Latest version, news and complete changelog on http://universalindent.sourceforge.net)

Permissions.Distribution_Permissions: You may use, distribute and copy the UniversalIndentGUI under the terms of the GNU General Public License version 2.
